item.description:
The topic of this meeting is Thoreau's Civil Disobedience plus the second part of the discussion of Walden Pond.

Mike suggestion for the more interesting parts of Walden Pond:

1. Beginning part of the text up to (and including) the chapter The Bean-Field

2. The chapter called Higher Laws

 

Please note that we are switching our skype meetings to Wednesdays while we are keeping the physical meetings on Thursdays.
item.how_to_find_us: Please send an e-mail to the organizer if this is your first time that you participate in our skype call.
item.name: Skype -- Thoreau: Civil Disobedience (plus 2nd part of Walden discussion)
